RelatedSentence: VIENNA , 16 May 2014 - OSCE Secretary General Lamberto Zannier authorized a 30.000 euro donation today from the Organisation 's Charity Fund for immediate help to the most affected in response to severe flooding across Bosnia and Herzegovina .
The OSCE Mission to BiH will continue to engage and help as the situation develops , working closely with other humanitarian organizations , EUFOR and Ministry of Security of BiH .
